Package core

package core
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    MainHTTPServerThread
    A simple multithreaded HTTP server that listens on a specified port and serves files from a configured root directory.
    RequestHandler
    Handles a single HTTP request from a connected client.
    ThreadPool
    A thread pool that manages a fixed number of worker threads to execute tasks.
    WorkerThread
    A worker thread that continuously executes tasks from a shared task queue.
